lines.name: The Apothecary
lines.flavourText: "You seek the power of my strongest potions, but the price will be far higher than you can imagine."

lines.name: House of Mirrors
lines.flavourText: What do you see in the mirror?

lines.name: The Price of Devotion
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{Unbeknown to Atziri's finest thaumaturgists, their loyalty would require far greater devotion than mere research.}

lines.name: The Doctor
lines.flavourText: "They said I needed my head examined, but I'd rather just take yours." - Klopek the Cannibal

lines.name: Unrequited Love
lines.flavourText:
<size:26>{The pale flame of his heart disappeared in his azure reflection.
The work of a life.
Ambitious, and unfinished.}

lines.name: The Demon
lines.flavourText: A man who hears voices may not necessarily be crazy.

lines.name: The Fiend
lines.flavourText:
<size:31>{Your era is now,
your power unwavered, 
soon we will see
who the gods truly favoured.}

lines.name: Love Through Ice
lines.flavourText:
"I know one lady for whose sake I will rip out my heart"

- Derrok, the Dreamer

lines.name: The Shieldbearer
lines.flavourText: While you grow, I shall be your knight, and you my squire. One day, you shall be the one who stands and defends our home.

lines.name: The Nurse
lines.flavourText: We tried to tell him to get his head checked.

lines.name: The Immortal
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{"Greetings! Just because you think I'm greedy doesn't mean I'm not willing to share. You'll just have to kill me first."
-Grandmaster Dy'Ness}

lines.name: The Cheater
lines.flavourText: Sometimes the best way to achieve greatness is to use a shortcut.

lines.name: The Sephirot
lines.flavourText: If the path to divinity were simple, we'd all be gods.

lines.name: Wealth and Power
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth or power he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to positively affect those around him.}

lines.name: The Strategist
lines.flavourText: Know thine enemy better than you know thyself.

lines.name: Seven Years Bad Luck
lines.flavourText: If enough people believe something to be true, whether or not it is becomes irrelevant.

lines.name: The Dragon's Heart
lines.flavourText: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

lines.name: The Academic
lines.flavourText:
<size:26>{"Such dedication for so many years,
all for a couple extra letters at the front of your name..."}

lines.name: Succor of the Sinless
lines.flavourText: Blessed is the blood of the beholden disciple. The earth is anointed by his step. The damnable are sanctified by his strike.

lines.name: Desecrated Virtue
lines.flavourText:
<size:25>{Awoken virtuous slivers of the void,
defiled by the avaricious, 
seized by the tyrannical.}

lines.name: The Enlightened
lines.flavourText:
Weaving the six,
a serpent stands tall.
Wearing a crown,
the thousand petals call.

lines.name: The Price of Loyalty
lines.flavourText: "Forge me a carapace from their skin, imbued with their soul. Then feed their flesh to the hounds."

lines.name: Brother's Stash
lines.flavourText:
Even though he found the stash just in time,
He would trade it all away and then some to have him back.

lines.name: The Samurai's Eye
lines.flavourText: At night, when the seas are calm, and the skies dark, he can see it. The formless fiend that took his eye, and fractured his mind.

lines.name: Choking Guilt
lines.flavourText: As death approached, clarity eluded him. The pain he had wrought surrounded him, dragging him into darkness.

lines.name: The Sacrifice
lines.flavourText: For some, the price of power is never too great.

lines.name: Doryani's Epiphany
lines.flavourText: "Virtue gems have facets beyond those that can be seen by the mortal eye. Let us look deeper..."

lines.name: Pride of the First Ones
lines.flavourText:
Upon silent paws and masked by the reeds, 
Farrul's hunt begins as the light recedes.

lines.name: Gemcutter's Mercy
lines.flavourText:
When you can only have one, which shall it be?
Red?
Blue?
Probably Green.

lines.name: Darker Half
lines.flavourText: When you find what you're looking for, it's never quite right. When you have what you desire, yet you still want more.

lines.name: Home
lines.flavourText: There are countless people, countless stories, and countless eras, but there is one place that, for a time, each of us loved and was loved. It matters. We matter.

lines.name: Deadly Joy
lines.flavourText:
<size:27>{"Be fast. That is all that matters."
- Rita of the Asylum}

lines.name: The Patient
lines.flavourText: I have a headache, can anyone find me a nurse?

lines.name: Beauty Through Death
lines.flavourText:
Her beauty did not fade 
her humanity did not survive.

lines.name: A Fate Worse Than Death
lines.flavourText: "It was as though my very thoughts were breaking... fracturing into tiny motes to be lost on the wind."

lines.name: The Artist
lines.flavourText: "Paint, metal, flesh... A true artist does not limit himself." - Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Nook's Crown
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{Every skull was once a person. 
Though 'Who?' is rarely asked. 
Friends, who wear 
the crown of Nook, 
Never need to ask. 
They remember.}

lines.name: The Destination
lines.flavourText: You may be nothing to everybody, but you are everything to somebody.

lines.name: Luminous Trove
lines.flavourText:
<size:24>{Plenty enter, dreaming of treasure
Twenty bled, slain as they fled
Shadows loom, half left doomed
The blind cries, five lost eyes
Careless twins, a lich's new prize
One as a decoy, none pass the king
Gehennix feeds only on whispers}

lines.name: The Gulf
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{I thought love stronger than all,
but time and isolation broke
that which madness could not.}

lines.name: The Polymath
lines.flavourText: Genius knows no limits.

lines.name: Altered Perception
lines.flavourText: You mustn't forget: you won't be leaving this place.

lines.name: Eternal Bonds
lines.flavourText:
Separate, stories untold.
Together, memories unfold.

lines.name: Gift of Asenath
lines.flavourText: The Golden Sekhema's words could solve many a feud. Just what form that solution took was another matter.

lines.name: The Damned
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{Souls along a conduit of blood, 
from one vessel to the next.}

lines.name: The Long Con
lines.flavourText:
"This was the proudest moment of my life."

"... so far"

lines.name: The Escape
lines.flavourText: In fleeing reality, you step into the realm of madness.

lines.name: Keeper's Corruption
lines.flavourText:
With great power comes...

...Even greater power.

lines.name: The Rabbit's Foot
lines.flavourText: It is said anyone who bears this trinket is the luckiest exile in all of Wraeclast. The gods would disagree, and forever curse any whom give it away.

lines.name: Draped in Dreams
lines.flavourText:
The suit I wear,
Is heavy and bare.
A canvas, it seems, breathing life into dreams.

lines.name: Azyran's Reward
lines.flavourText:
Method transcends shape and size. Do something in parallel long enough, and you will always find 
another way.

lines.name: Broken Promises
lines.flavourText: Experience teaches us that the cold is not the same as the absence of warmth.

lines.name: Desperate Crusade
lines.flavourText: Through despondent hardships, those strong of spirit shall claim the prize.

lines.name: Something Dark
lines.flavourText: Even in darkness you may find a friend.

lines.name: The Chosen
lines.flavourText: They whose lives were given to clothe the Dark Dreamer... They were the lucky ones.

lines.name: The Eye of Terror
lines.flavourText: The Lord of Chaos dreams as his Eye gazes, unblinking, at his prize. And soon, all shall tremble before his waking form.

lines.name: The Sustenance
lines.flavourText: She took all she had and turned it into something she was craving.

lines.name: The Enforcer

explicitModifiers.text:
<magicitem>{Spiked Gloves of the Conquest (Culling Strike)}
<default>{Item Level:} <normal>{86}
<default>{Warlord Item}

lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{"Boss said to get rid of him, didn't say not to make a mess."
- Rune The Goon}

lines.name: Alluring Bounty
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{A treasure worth killing for 
is a treasure worth dying for.}

lines.name: Imperfect Memories
lines.flavourText: Everything is eroded by time, but sometimes the edges that fade can make a wonderful memory even more beautiful.

lines.name: The Eldritch Decay
lines.flavourText: Time dismantles all things eventually, but some wish to accelerate the process.

lines.name: The Aspirant
lines.flavourText:
<size:26>{Those Exiles that survive Wraeclast
dream not of home, but of power.}

lines.name: The Bitter Blossom
lines.flavourText: The pain you feel is of no consequence, it is evolution, to be made whole within something greater.

lines.name: The Scout
lines.flavourText: The first to travel are often rewarded for their journey, but all the treasure in the world cannot bring back those that are lost.

lines.name: The One That Got Away
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{Savor life's missing pieces.
To complete one's final goal
is to take one's last breath.}

lines.name: Winter's Embrace
lines.flavourText:
<size:29>{Come home to me, my sweet.
Oh, how long you've been!
Lie with me in the frozen dark.
I may yet find forgiveness
Now that fear has left you.}

lines.name: The Shortcut
lines.flavourText: If time is the most valuable currency, how do you make more of it?

lines.name: Abandoned Wealth
lines.flavourText: When the world burned, the greedy burned with it, while the clever left as paupers.

lines.name: Death
lines.flavourText:
<size:31>{The end of the old,
the beginning of the new.
A unique opportunity for transformation,
for those with the power
to grasp it.}

lines.name: The Professor
lines.flavourText: The academic route to knowledge is wide and well-trodden; but it is the untaught one who scales the mountain.

lines.name: Monochrome
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{"You cannot portray the world using just one colour. Together, you and I, we will paint our world into perfection." 
- Kyra, renegade thaumaturgist}

lines.name: The Primordial
lines.flavourText:
We play at God with our necromancy, 
but forces far more potent 
sleep within these stones.

lines.name: Council of Cats
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{A King Loved By All,
A Shadow Awaiting Nightfall,
A Speaker Howling Away,
A Hunter Seeking Prey}

lines.name: The Progeny of Lunaris
lines.flavourText:
Born beneath silver light, bearing Lunaris' mark.
Conjuring all his might, the Prodigy turned light to dark.

lines.name: The White Knight
lines.flavourText: Where Decay festers, I shall expunge it, and leave in its place a shining monument.

lines.name: The Greatest Intentions
lines.flavourText: Chasing purity in the rising light means facing the darkening edges of the spirit.

lines.name: Fateful Meeting
lines.flavourText:
<size:26>{Some people act as beacons, illuminating the path for others. I was lucky to meet one such person.

- Anton to Zhenya}

lines.name: The Astromancer
lines.flavourText:
<size:24>{They would say that he was a dangerous man,
unbound by the sense of morality,
but what does this matter,
when his love for humanity is undeniable
and completion of his work would benefit everyone?}

lines.name: The Hook
lines.flavourText: Every obsession began with a single, innocent taste.

lines.name: The Eternal War
lines.flavourText: They believed, falsely, that the strongest of generals could outlast eons of corruption.

lines.name: Dementophobia
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{I never truly understood the depths of my insanity,
until I realized the voices beckoning me towards the abyss,
were none other than my own.}

lines.name: A Stone Perfected
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{They gave the stone life. Over eons spent bathed in Corruption, that life evolved.}

lines.name: Justified Ambition
lines.flavourText:
"Everything I have done has been for Wraeclast. You would pledge your life to me if you saw things my way... and soon, you will."
- High Templar Venarius

lines.name: Silence and Frost
lines.flavourText:
Cry havoc!
Unleash pandemonium!

lines.name: The Leviathan
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{Ancient behemoths swam the
depths of the oceans long
before Man walked these lands.}

lines.name: Chaotic Disposition
lines.flavourText: Life isn't what you make of it, it's already been made for you.

lines.name: Ambitious Obsession
lines.flavourText: The most pathetic person in the world is someone who has sight, but no vision.

lines.name: Dying Light
lines.flavourText: Even the brightest eventually fade to darkness.

lines.name: Emperor of Purity
lines.flavourText:
True to his title,
Voll, newly crowned,
had many of the
Eternal Empire's signature
extravagances destroyed.

lines.name: Dark Dreams
lines.flavourText: No one ever truly understood what she meant when she said she wanted to raise a family.

lines.name: Void of the Elements
lines.flavourText: Though the forces of nature are mighty and intimidating, it is their absence which should be feared.

lines.name: Brotherhood in Exile
lines.flavourText:
<size:25>{Seeking shelter from the night,
in the warmth of the run-down inn,
erstwhile foes put aside the fight,
to bond over whiskey and gin.}

lines.name: The Offspring
lines.flavourText: The swarm began with just a couple of children. Now, it is her entire existence.

lines.name: Magnum Opus
lines.flavourText: Wraeclast will unite. This shall be my great work - the minds of the people made one.

lines.name: The Bargain
lines.flavourText: In the pursuit of power, as in that of wealth, anything goes.

lines.name: The Soul
lines.flavourText: "Most people only have one. I'm a bit of a hoarder."

lines.name: Remembrance
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{"For all your struggles, all your achievements, even for the greatest of us, a story is all that remains. Write it well." 

-Julius Perandus, Father of Chitus}

lines.name: Mawr Blaidd
lines.flavourText: Rigwald believed he'd seized great power, but it was the great power that had seized Rigwald

lines.name: The Hunger
lines.flavourText:
"How many lives have you consumed?" 
"How many times have you blinked?"

lines.name: The Offering
lines.flavourText: Eternal beauty has a cost, one which Shavronne was happy to pay with the lives of others.

lines.name: The Porcupine
lines.flavourText: The first quill separates the quick learners from the dead.

lines.name: Immortal Resolve
lines.flavourText: The threads of fate are the strongest ties.

lines.name: The Celestial Stone
lines.flavourText: Stare into its depths too long, and you may lose yourself entirely.

lines.name: The Undisputed
lines.flavourText: To create something truly spectacular, you must risk total failure.

lines.name: The Heroic Shot
lines.flavourText: Try a thousand times, and eventually you'll have to give up.

lines.name: The Old Man
lines.flavourText: Hear me, fish! I love and respect you, but before this day ends I will kill you dead.

lines.name: Divine Justice
lines.flavourText: Many sought the Goddess' blessing. Few survived the Labyrinth to receive it.

lines.name: The Awakened
lines.flavourText: Some seek to change the world. Others change the world as a consequence of what they seek.

lines.name: Peaceful Moments
lines.flavourText: Savour these moments, for they may never return.

lines.name: A Familiar Call
lines.flavourText:
The mighty huntress always called for her share,
But what we shared was a lifelong bond.

lines.name: A Modest Request
lines.flavourText:
<size:25>{Cede all power and wealth to me and serve me in perpetuity.
A minor inconvenience I assure you.}

lines.name: Lachrymal Necrosis

explicitModifiers.text:
<rareitem>{Jewel}
<enchanted>{Implicit Modifier:} 
<magicitem>{Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you}
<corrupted>{Corrupted}

lines.flavourText: Without the ability to weep, the heart hardens against both the pure and the corrupt.

lines.name: The Emptiness
lines.flavourText: He appeared before the Light Eater, and at once knew his soul was damned.

lines.name: Chasing Risk
lines.flavourText: A fond memory fills me with nostalgia; some men would have felt guilt, but I felt no regret over the anguish and fear my ambitions caused.

lines.name: Bijoux
lines.flavourText: "Such fine trinkets show their true value in times of crisis." - Tangmazu

lines.name: Judging Voices
lines.flavourText: He was seeking sanity, but the demons were inside his head.

lines.name: Duality
lines.flavourText: Good and Evil can be woven together to become something greater than either.

lines.name: Further Invention
lines.flavourText: Why not both?

lines.name: The Risk
lines.flavourText: "There is no right or wrong choice, no best or worst. There are only choices and their consequences."

lines.name: Rebirth and Renewal
lines.flavourText: Life has an end, then life begins again.

lines.name: Lethean Temptation
lines.flavourText: My memories tortured me without end. To escape them, I embraced nothingness, but oblivion simply brought a different kind of pain...

lines.name: Rebirth
lines.flavourText:
He shattered Her smile
Scattered the fragments like ash
All she did was laugh

lines.name: The Mind's Eyes
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{Through the eyes of a person, 
you can see their soul
Through the eyes of a jewel, 
you can see the universe}

lines.name: Endless Night
lines.flavourText: The sun shines not for me. I walk in darkness, never free. Time stopped when you both died in my arms.

lines.name: Audacity
lines.flavourText:
<size:27>{A jolt, and it moves. Or smolders.
A current, and it lives. Or dies.
A surge, and it transcends.
Or... not.
Only one way to find out.}

lines.name: Bowyer's Dream
lines.flavourText: If this is my dream, I don't wish to wake.

lines.name: Cartographer's Delight
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{A map is similar
to a pair of eyes,
without one you stumble
around, unable to find your way.}

lines.name: Hunter's Reward
lines.flavourText: To tame a beast, you first must subdue its heart.

lines.name: Light and Truth
lines.flavourText:
Time and change
shall naught avail,
To dim the Light
of Truth's fair grail.

lines.name: Lucky Deck
lines.flavourText: When the outcome is the same, does it matter if it is fortune or trickery?

lines.name: Merciless Armament
lines.flavourText:
"Through thick and thin,
blood and bone,
a peaceful life
is one I can't condone."
- Tukohama, Father Of War

lines.name: Pride Before the Fall
lines.flavourText:
<size:27>{As Kaom slew the last of his kin,
something deep inside him broke.
And through the cracks, corruption,
pure and black, spread forth.}

lines.name: The Avenger
lines.flavourText:
Justice comes swift 
Equal to the crime 
Revenge is a gift 
Life for a life 
Eye for an eye

lines.name: The Brittle Emperor
lines.flavourText:
<size:31>{"When Voll spared Malachai, accepting his aid in pursuit of Purity, the strongest faith was infected by Corruption and made brittle as glass."
- Victario, the People's Poet}

lines.name: The Cartographer
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{It's always easier to find your way if you draw a map of the progress you've made.}

lines.name: The Cataclysm
lines.flavourText: <size:27>{The mighty warriors traded in blows, the nimble archers in arrows, yet it was the brazen thaumaturgists who would bring catastrophe to all.}

lines.name: The Celestial Justicar
lines.flavourText: Wrapped in the glory of the heavens, she comes to mete out justice for the fallen.

lines.name: The Conduit
lines.flavourText: The path to godhood is guided by the hand of sacrifice.

lines.name: The Dapper Prodigy
lines.flavourText: "Many believe murder is a grisly, grim, and grotesque crime. Then there are those who simply make art of it."

lines.name: The Ethereal
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{"Long ago, people looked to the stars, believing they influenced us. Soon, it will be us who influence the stars."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturge}

lines.name: The Jester
lines.flavourText:
<size:25>{Summoned for the King's desire,
soon applause came from the court.
However insanity was his only sire,
so the King's reign was cut short.}

lines.name: The King's Heart
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{500 times Kaom's axe fell, 500 times Kaom's Heart splintered. Finally, all that remained was a terrible, heartless Fury.}

lines.name: The Last One Standing
lines.flavourText: The strongest emerge from suffering. The toughest bear the most scars. The sole survivor claims the greatest of rewards.

lines.name: The Mercenary
lines.flavourText: Loyalty can be bought. Just make sure you know who the buyer is.

lines.name: The Pact
lines.flavourText: "On this day I mark the first of many agreements that I will have with this land and its people."

lines.name: The Queen
lines.flavourText:
The power of the world, 
lies upon your hands.

lines.name: The Road to Power
lines.flavourText: A beacon on the horizon; a guiding light, a call for help, or a warning to turn back.

lines.name: The Scavenger
lines.flavourText: Take small pieces of things and then assemble them together

lines.name: The Surgeon
lines.flavourText:
"He might be lacking in vision, but his virtuosity is undeniable."
- Malachai, on Maligaro

lines.name: The Thaumaturgist
lines.flavourText:
<size:31>{"Mastery of thaumaturgy is like any other pursuit; it requires dedication and sacrifice. Sometimes several sacrifices."
- Shavronne of Umbra}

lines.name: The Tyrant
lines.flavourText:
"Fear controls the masses."
- Laszlo, the Scourge

lines.name: The Vast
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{Can you hear the siren's calls,
Just beyond the sea?
A voice which hearts
of men enthralls,
I too am hooked to thee.}

lines.name: The Void
lines.flavourText: Reach into the Void and claim your prize.

lines.name: The Wolven King's Bite
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{A wolf does not bite his mate as he does his prey, yet both begin with bared teeth. Know who you are, and you will know the meaning of the bite.}

lines.name: The Saint's Treasure
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Publicly, he lived a pious and chaste life of poverty. Privately, tithes and tributes made him and his lascivious company very comfortable indeed.}

lines.name: Atziri's Arsenal
lines.flavourText: In the prison of all sins, will you grasp godhood or sorrow? Only hope lies under the shadows.

lines.name: Left to Fate
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{Many strive for greatness,
but it is challenge, unforeseen,
that forges heroes.}

lines.name: The Obscured
lines.flavourText: Our world, dangerous as it is, is far safer than what lies just beyond our sight.

lines.name: The Breach
lines.flavourText: Ever get the feeling you're being watched...?

lines.name: The World Eater
lines.flavourText: Its body knows no limits. Its appetite knows no bounds.

lines.name: The Dreamer
lines.flavourText:
<size:29>{A dark note drips 
from the dreamer's lips, 
A honeyed melody. 
We stand, we fall 
on his beck and call, 
for in his dream we're free.}

lines.name: The Jeweller's Boon
lines.flavourText: The jeweller's true talent is the capacity to see a jewel's beauty before they draw it out.

lines.name: The Hale Heart
lines.flavourText: Though the years weakened his mind, his body remained deadly as ever.

lines.name: Perfection
lines.flavourText: There are countless worlds, but only those with limitless potential will be able to achieve perfection.

lines.name: The Master
lines.flavourText: In a world filled with chaos, he could always seek comfort in the hands of his master.

lines.name: The Undaunted
lines.flavourText:
<size:29>{"Fate was always my nemesis... 
But it didn't stop me then, and it won't stop me now."
- Kjetilbrann, The Undaunted}

lines.name: The Darkest Dream
lines.flavourText: A dream from which you cannot awake is nothing other than a nightmare.

lines.name: Harmony of Souls
lines.flavourText:
<size:29>{Shrieking souls locked away 
Hate splits frozen cells asunder 
The knot of corruption
undone at last}

lines.name: The Innocent
lines.flavourText: His brother would not atone, so he took his brother's life, and with it, his sins.

lines.name: Boon of the First Ones
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{Wreathed in the skin and bones
of the beasts she slew, 
her gift came from what she lost: 
her humanity.}

lines.name: The Endless Darkness
lines.flavourText: Gaze towards the stars, but beware what gazes back.

lines.name: The Cacophony
lines.flavourText: Nothing can be heard above the din or seen amongst the turmoil. The senses are shattered. All is left to fate.

lines.name: A Dab of Ink
lines.flavourText: The Poet's blood is the Empire's ink.

lines.name: Sambodhi's Vow
lines.flavourText:
<size:34>{He dispels dark realms
until mortal sufferings
yield to hopeful light.}

lines.name: Arrogance of the Vaal
lines.flavourText: Discovery can lead to beauty, or it can lead to ruin.

lines.name: Alone in the Darkness
lines.flavourText:
"Sometimes, the most beautiful treasures...are the ones you cannot have." 
- Beryl, Survivor from the Azurite Mines

lines.name: The Lord of Celebration
lines.flavourText: Though they were a pack of elite combatants, the Emperor's royal guards were not ready to face one of his notorious parties.

lines.name: The Landing
lines.flavourText: Warriors of a distant land, you embark on a journey from which you may not return, but which we will be all the better for.

lines.name: The Seeker
lines.flavourText: All that is flawed is worthless. The slightest error, and this might as well be trash.

lines.name: The Life Thief
lines.flavourText:
"The process of eternal youth is a give and take. You give them death and take their youth."
- Zerphi of the Vaal

lines.name: Burning Blood
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{There's a place where up is down, 
where right is wrong, 
where pleasure is agony, 
and where the living wish only for death.}

lines.name: Echoes of Love
lines.flavourText: "I gave up my body for you. I gave up my name for you. And one day I shall give up my life for you."

lines.name: Demigod's Wager
lines.flavourText: Sometimes you need to make your own luck.

lines.name: The Deal
lines.flavourText: In the pursuit of wealth, as in that of power, anything goes.

lines.name: Deathly Designs
lines.flavourText: "The Karui was correct; there is virtue in honouring my ancestors."

lines.name: The Craving
lines.flavourText: What was once a passing thought tickling the back of the mind is now a desperate, driving desire.

lines.name: Underground Forest
lines.flavourText: "In the forest again... But at least I have these."

lines.name: Etched in Blood
lines.flavourText: When you strive to write your name on the dense pages of History, someone else, inevitably, must be crossed out.

lines.name: The Fishmonger
lines.flavourText: However vicious Rhoas might be, a dedicated angler may in time tame them.

lines.name: Prometheus' Armoury
lines.flavourText: It is a mortal man's folly to seek power beyond his comprehension.

lines.name: The Tumbleweed
lines.flavourText: Love is the only redemption after succumbing to the grasps of the Wasteland.

lines.name: The Hive of Knowledge
lines.flavourText: Within years of knowledge, distilled by careful craftsmanship, lies great power.

lines.name: The Unexpected Prize
lines.flavourText:
They came from far and wide under a common banner.
They sought companionship and competition,
but found a treasure none had foreseen.

lines.name: Triskaidekaphobia
lines.flavourText: The Mists of Madness prey on those who harbour the deepest of fears.

lines.name: The Whiteout
lines.flavourText:
<size:25>{They thought winter had come early,
that snow blanketed the land,
but in truth, all their chickens
had come home to roost.}

lines.name: The Bear Woman
lines.flavourText:
<size:24>{For the blessed bear in the cave,
A hundred days pass in silence and darkness,
until moon begins its fourth passage,
the bear sheds her beastly fur,
and is reborn, human and whole.}

lines.name: Haunting Shadows
lines.flavourText:
In the dead of night you may elude your shadows,
but they will always find you by dawn.

lines.name: Reckless Ambition
lines.flavourText: Why settle when more is never enough.

lines.name: The Enthusiasts
lines.flavourText:
<size:25>{"Glimmers of benevolence,
Shrouded a lacquered lust for power,
Yet still they followed his influence."}

lines.name: The Card Sharp
lines.flavourText: "The house always wins... except when I do."

lines.name: Sambodhi's Wisdom
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{No blade conquers sin;
guide a sinner to virtue,
unveil his lost sight
your eyes, too, see in
everyone the inner child,
no matter their might.}

lines.name: Costly Curio
lines.flavourText: "Oh no, I couldn't possibly afford this fine artefact. I'm... just looking."

lines.name: The Price of Prescience
lines.flavourText: <size:26>{The strange voice showed Aul a future where his legacy was forgotten, where new cultures broke themselves upon Aul's ruined world.}

lines.name: Terrible Secret of Space
lines.flavourText: They said they were here to protect us.

lines.name: Guardian's Challenge
lines.flavourText: To accept a challenge from the void is merely suicide for the unprepared.

lines.name: The Forgotten Treasure
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{Don't let fool's gold deceive you.}

lines.name: The Prince of Darkness
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{Fear a man who is willing to sacrifice anything for power.}

lines.name: The Catch
lines.flavourText: The largest hooks offer the greatest catch, but often the catch is the hook.

lines.name: Parasitic Passengers
lines.flavourText: Feeding on death, they grew stronger and stronger, until they were ready to hatch...

lines.name: The Magma Crab
lines.flavourText: Drink deeply of living rock and be as stone, with blood afire.

lines.name: Misery in Darkness
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{He wandered the bone-filled depths hoping each corner would be his last.
Eventually, he found Light.}

lines.name: The Forward Gaze
lines.flavourText: "When they realize our true intent, they will decry us, assault us, and try to crush what we have built. We must stand tall, Qotra, and make the future our own."

lines.name: The Brawny Battle Mage
lines.flavourText: A humble piece of wood offers the simplest solution to life's problems: just hit them really, really hard.

lines.name: The Dungeon Master
lines.flavourText: "So desperate was I for control, I turned my entire world into a prison. Now you will share in my agony."

lines.name: Astral Protection
lines.flavourText:
For a time, we had something stronger than eldritch evil.
We had each other.

lines.name: Azure Rage
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{The mask hides his identity
but also makes it hard to read...}

lines.name: Checkmate
lines.flavourText: When victory is impossible, each of us plays only to delay the end.

lines.name: The Shepherd's Sandals
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{He who watches the flock is himself watched by those with loyalty beyond measure.}

lines.name: Heterochromia
lines.flavourText:
<size:26>{Black and White, Silver and Gold
Let us see the world Unfold
Red and Blue, Yellow and Green
Let us remake it in colours Unseen}

lines.name: The Messenger
lines.flavourText:
<<hbgi04>><<HBG04>><<HBGAt>><<HBG03>><<HBGAs>><<HBG01>><<HBGAy>><<HBG01>><<HBGBa>>
<<hbgi04>><<HBG02>><<HBGAk>><<HBG03>><<HBGBd>>
<<hbgi04>><<HBG02>><<HBGAm>><<HBG01>><<HBGAa>>
<<HBGBc>><<HBG03>><<HBGAy>><<hbgi00>><<HBGBe>><<HBG03>><<HBGAd>>

lines.name: Vinia's Token
lines.flavourText: You can change your name, but you cannot change your history.

lines.name: The Twilight Moon
lines.flavourText: The day is dying, the night is born, the air grows cool, the sky is torn.

lines.name: Treasure Hunter
lines.flavourText:
"Don't worry, I know what I'm doing."
- Toggo's Last Words

lines.name: The Incantation
lines.flavourText: When there is no other choice, even the meekest whisper can bring about the greatest storm.

lines.name: Unchained
lines.flavourText: Mold the world with your bare hands. Be careful, for what is your doing might become your undoing.

lines.name: From Bone to Ashes
lines.flavourText: For centuries, they stood vigil in secret over their sleeping goddess, even as contamination oozed out of the decadent Vaal empire.

lines.name: The Oath
lines.flavourText: An oath once made is an oath never broken. Do not delay in keeping it, for I take no pleasure in fools.

lines.name: The Archmage's Right Hand
lines.flavourText: "When grasped in his hand, even an ordinary piece of wood can make the heavens tremble with fear."

lines.name: The Surveyor
lines.flavourText: Exploring lands made of flesh and sorrow, we'll reap and plunder like there's no tomorrow.

lines.name: The Drunken Aristocrat
lines.flavourText: The finer the brew, the harder it is to remember drinking it.

lines.name: The Lich
lines.flavourText: When the dead raise and master their own, the land is truly lost.

lines.name: The Traitor
lines.flavourText:
<size:31>{Sometimes an apprentice becomes a master through countless hours of hard work and practice.
Sometimes it happens by force.}

lines.name: Last Hope
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{As their civilisation crumbled, the Vaal looked to their queen. In her, they saw a way out. In them, she saw a burden she was happy to free herself from.}

lines.name: No Traces
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{There is no mistake so great that it cannot be undone.}

lines.name: The Wilted Rose
lines.flavourText: Though the path to divinity is fraught with peril, hope may bloom from within.

lines.name: A Mother's Parting Gift
lines.flavourText:
Nature was her domain,
Love was her song,
Family was her devotion,
Knowledge was her gift.

lines.name: Anarchy's Price
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Born of relentless fury and abhorrence, warped by turmoil and anguish, tainted through desire and carnality, I thirst for bloodshed once more.}

lines.name: Assassin's Favour
lines.flavourText:
By the time their eyes meet, 
the dark deal has long since been made, 
and his fate long since sealed.

lines.name: Blind Venture
lines.flavourText:
"It's risky not knowing where your wares come from. That's why I source my own."
- Klayver, the Antiquarian

lines.name: Boundless Realms
lines.flavourText: Boundless is the distance between where we start and where we start again.

lines.name: Coveted Possession
lines.flavourText: A taste of power brings a hunger for more.

lines.name: Destined to Crumble
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{"Let us not forget the most important lesson the Vaal taught us:
Nothing is eternal."
- Siosa Foaga, Imperial Scholar}

lines.name: Dialla's Subjugation
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{A symbol of beauty and innocence
The gems corrupted her mind
Malachai corrupted her gems
All but a glimmer of
greatness lost in madness}

lines.name: Doedre's Madness
lines.flavourText: "Hold your tongue before I claim it." - Doedre Darktongue

lines.name: Dying Anguish
lines.flavourText: <size:29>{Moribund, he gazed upon the journey taken as blood trickled down his chin. His eye closed on the city ahead that he would never call home.}

lines.name: Earth Drinker
lines.flavourText: Taste and grow strong. Drink too much and be buried.

lines.name: Emperor's Luck
lines.flavourText: The house always wins.

lines.name: Gemcutter's Promise
lines.flavourText: <size:29>{"I swore to use my position to help the people. What good is power when it just accumulates on the already-powerful?" - Erasmus, Imperial Gemcutter}

lines.name: Gift of the Gemling Queen
lines.flavourText:
Our Lady Dialla,
as a symbol of our progress,
shines greater than all the gems.

lines.name: Glimmer of Hope
lines.flavourText: When you dwell in total darkness, even the faintest light may guide you out.

lines.name: Grave Knowledge
lines.flavourText: The dead tell me great insights. They've had nothing but time to sit and think.

lines.name: Her Mask
lines.flavourText:
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.

lines.name: Hope
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.}

lines.name: Hubris
lines.flavourText:
"This one? It is NOT for sale. You would sooner pry it from my lifeless hand."
- Jonf Darontos, Ringmaker

lines.name: Hunter's Resolve
lines.flavourText:
Primed, curved and sleek.
Decisive and final.
For malice and righteousness.
There's but one solution.

lines.name: Jack in the Box
lines.flavourText:
Turn the crank, 
close your eyes, 
and pray to the gods 
for a pleasant surprise.

lines.name: Lantador's Lost Love
lines.flavourText:
<smaller>{They fought the storm together as one, 
Until the longest of days was done. 
Their love grew stronger
with every breath, 
Until it was broken apart in death.}

lines.name: Lost Worlds
lines.flavourText:
<size:27>{"There are worlds that lie beyond the edge of my page, the edge of my understanding. Worlds of wonder. Worlds of terror."
Aramil - Cartographer to Emperor Chitus}

lines.name: Loyalty
lines.flavourText:
Bound by fate,
inseparable by choice.

lines.name: Lucky Connections
lines.flavourText: Luck is a fool's game, and I know plenty of rich fools.

lines.name: Lysah's Respite
lines.flavourText:
So many memories,
so much pain in
such a small token.
Drown it in blood
so you can forget.

lines.name: Prosperity
lines.flavourText: Accumulating wealth has its own costs.

lines.name: Rain of Chaos
lines.flavourText:
<size:27>{Fire filled the sky that night 
Chaos reigned 
Where the shards fell 
All was destroyed 
-Jozen Kasigi, retelling an urban legend of the Cataclysm}

lines.name: Rain Tempter
lines.flavourText: Be like water, friend.

lines.name: Rats
lines.flavourText: Whoever said 'more is always better' has obviously never met a rat.

lines.name: Scholar of the Seas
lines.flavourText: I've never come upon a ship I could not command. I have however met sailors that were not willing to be led.

lines.name: Shard of Fate
lines.flavourText:
Their whims left unknown,
Their life left for others.

lines.name: The Aesthete
lines.flavourText:
"Some see our mortal flesh as a limitation. I see it as an opportunity for vast, miraculous improvements."
- Shavronne of Umbra

lines.name: The Arena Champion
lines.flavourText: The fight is the easy part. It's the years of training that'll kill you.

lines.name: The Battle Born
lines.flavourText: "No man can best me, no demon can fell me. For I vanquish all with my axe!"

lines.name: The Betrayal
lines.flavourText: It's sad times we live in when a friendship has a price people are willing to pay.

lines.name: The Body
lines.flavourText: They say it is the head that leads, but all must flow through the body at some point.

lines.name: The Calling
lines.flavourText: <size:32>{Blood flows not just through veins, but through worlds.}

lines.name: The Carrion Crow
lines.flavourText:
From death, life. 
From life, death. 
The wheel turns, 
and the corbies wheel overhead.

lines.name: The Catalyst
lines.flavourText: Simple actions can lead the world to an early grave.

lines.name: The Chains that Bind
lines.flavourText: Scarier than any criminal is an innocent man in chains, for when he breaks free, his revenge will be justified.

lines.name: The Cursed King
lines.flavourText:
The First Ones
may be blasphemy,
but they are
powerful blasphemy.

lines.name: The Dark Mage
lines.flavourText:
With staff in hand
and wrath in heart,
your soul and corpse
shall surely part.

lines.name: The Demoness
lines.flavourText: Wherever she went, death was sure to follow.

lines.name: The Doppelganger
lines.flavourText: Upon seeing her face, I am terrifiedthe moon shows me my own form!

lines.name: The Dragon
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{Scaly beast of the skies,
watching with his golden eyes.
Shadow that blocks out the sun,
it's too late for you to run.}

lines.name: The Encroaching Darkness
lines.flavourText: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

lines.name: The Endurance
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{Crimson rubies, drops of vigour,
flowing through my veins,
flesh like coal, try to crush me,
diamond is what remains.}

lines.name: The Explorer
lines.flavourText: A map is only useful if you know where you stand.

lines.name: The Feast
lines.flavourText: Shame what happened to my husband. He had such good taste.

lines.name: The Fletcher
lines.flavourText: Let these fine arrows pack a punch.

lines.name: The Flora's Gift
lines.flavourText:
Sturdy and strong,
grown from the stream.
The Flora that live here,
A combatant's dream.

lines.name: The Formless Sea
lines.flavourText:
Formless might,
Wild beauty tamed,
The brine of gods,
The seas restrained.

lines.name: The Fox
lines.flavourText:
"Masters of wit, strength and cunning. To survive the harsh winters, you must be like the fox."
- Ezomyte Proverb

lines.name: The Gambler
lines.flavourText: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

lines.name: The Gemcutter
lines.flavourText: In the hands of a master craftsman, a worthless pebble can adorn the crown of a king.

lines.name: The Gentleman
lines.flavourText: "Axes and mauls are so uncivilised. A good clean cut to the neck with a sharp blade, that's the Sarn way!"

lines.name: The Gladiator
lines.flavourText:
The thumb turns down
and the crowd roars, 
they want death 
and the blood is yours.

lines.name: The Harvester
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{Taste not of their
forbidden fruit.
Theirs is a harvest of
the darkest kind,
twisted, rotten and
damned for eternity.}

lines.name: The Hermit
lines.flavourText: The hermit's only friend is the greenery he can find.

lines.name: The Hoarder
lines.flavourText: "More! I want more!" - Faendris, the Insatiable

lines.name: The Inoculated
lines.flavourText: Chaos spread, wreaking havoc and death. They said none would be spared, and yet here I stand.

lines.name: The Inventor
lines.flavourText:
Jump right in, 
But beware 
Of things broken 
Or beyond compare.

lines.name: The King's Blade
lines.flavourText:
<size:25>{"To know for what you fight. To get up again when you've been struck down. To outmanoeuvre someone faster, trick someone smarter, crush someone stronger. That's what it takes to claim the crown."
- Daresso, the King of Swords}

lines.name: The Lion
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{The Eternals lauded his valour. The Karui relished his defeat. Yet the final thoughts of Marceus Lioneye were naught but lament for his pride.}

lines.name: The Lord in Black
lines.flavourText:
<size:27>{Thy knee shall bend
in shifting dark,
thy blade shall serve his vigil.
Thy oath shall bind thee
to his mark,
thy flesh shall bear his sigil.}

lines.name: The Lover
lines.flavourText: <size:26>{"I wanted to give you three things. I've given you my eternal love. I've sung to you my most beautiful song. I'd have given you the moon last, but it couldn't be found. I hope you'll accept this instead."}

lines.name: The Lunaris Priestess
lines.flavourText:
Embrace the Light,
Await the Morrow,
No more Spite,
And no more Sorrow.

lines.name: The Metalsmith's Gift
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{A month's work, a year's wages, a foolish shortcut through a Rhoa's nest, and a grieving bride-to-be, who never received her betrothed's great gift.}

lines.name: The One With All
lines.flavourText:
<size:26>{Embrace death to honour the lost,
no fear in life no matter the cost. 
With one of all we are, 
and all of one we trust, 
throughout past, present and future... be just.}

lines.name: The Pack Leader
lines.flavourText: Become the leader you were born to be.

lines.name: The Penitent
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{First, I gave my wealth, and we went hungry. Next, I gave my land, and we were homeless. Then, I gave my family, and I was alone. Last, I gave my eyes, and all I could dream was mine.}

lines.name: The Poet
lines.flavourText:
<size:27>{God had forsaken the land 
And Victario wept.
Corruption consumed the land 
And Victario's tears turned to blood.}

lines.name: The Rabid Rhoa
lines.flavourText:
"Experiment 22A: Rhoas, when deprived of water, secrete a most delightfully potent toxin."
- Maligaro

lines.name: The Scarred Meadow
lines.flavourText: The earth offers nourishment, growth and healing. Unless, of course, the sky has other plans.

lines.name: The Scholar
lines.flavourText: It is with the smallest of words that we find the largest of truths.

lines.name: The Sigil
lines.flavourText:
<size:29>{Three men travel
through the gate;
they carry a protective ward.
A faction conspires
against their fate,
but magic unravels the sword.}

lines.name: The Siren
lines.flavourText:
<size:26>{At the beck and call
of The Siren's hand,
winter ravages
the trembling land,
and the weight of ice that binds
will break the strongest of minds.}

lines.name: The Spoiled Prince
lines.flavourText: A boy who grows up with everything learns to appreciate nothing.

lines.name: The Stormcaller
lines.flavourText:
If you beckon the
Lord of Lightning,
do not be surprised
when you are struck.

lines.name: The Summoner
lines.flavourText: To own a piece of the Nightmare, you must first belong to the Nightmare.

lines.name: The Sun
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Each night, the light dies, and each morning she is born anew, embracing the land in her golden wings.}

lines.name: The Survivalist
lines.flavourText:
A lucky number 
For us all 
To help us through 
The perils told.

lines.name: The Throne
lines.flavourText: A king's movement is unwavering.

lines.name: The Tower
lines.flavourText: A tower built of the strongest stone is not eternal; a towering intellect is not enlightened.

lines.name: The Trial
lines.flavourText: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

lines.name: The Twins
The Union
lines.flavourText:
On the 21st of Eterni, 
two become one, 
their light outshines 
the setting sun.

lines.name: The Valkyrie
lines.flavourText:
<size:26>{The villain strikes,
the world is torn.
A war begins, a hero is born,
The nemesis sets the sky alight.
A hero's sacrifice
sets everything right.
- Drake's Epitaph}

lines.name: The Visionary
lines.flavourText: Lioneye looked to the heights of glorious victory. And thus he missed the defeat right under his nose.

lines.name: The Warden
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{Brutus' first innovation as Lord Incarcerator was a weighted chain around every neck so that his prisoners would forever bow to him.}

lines.name: The Warlord
lines.flavourText:
To cure the Goddess,
and break the chains of corruption,
you must shatter the world.

lines.name: The Watcher
lines.flavourText:
<size:31>{Strange eyes on top of spines 
Gaze beyond the veil of time 
Deep down below the mines 
A dream of crimson and of grime}

lines.name: The Web
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{A weapon, a shelter, a prison.
The web's purpose changes
with the spider's needs.
A lesson we should
take to heart.}

lines.name: The Wind
lines.flavourText: <size:33>{Weaving through the cracks, searching for weaknesses, silent, indiscriminate, leaving sorrow in its wake.}

lines.name: The Wolf
lines.flavourText: <size:29>{The largest beasts cannot be overpowered. The Greatwolf teaches us to use guile, not strength, to probe for the soft flesh and strike deep.}

lines.name: The Wolf's Shadow
lines.flavourText: "If I fall, we will fall together with my fangs in your throat."

lines.name: The Wrath
lines.flavourText: <size:31>{"Daughter of catastrophe, mother of pain. Amongst the filth of Wraeclast, she wanders, and her wrath follows." - Quintoon the Returned}

lines.name: Three Faces in the Dark
lines.flavourText: For every threat you spy in the shadows, there are two others you don't.

lines.name: Thunderous Skies
lines.flavourText: <size:30>{Many that have wielded the power of lightning have said that death by electrocution looks like the victim is more alive than ever before.}

lines.name: Time-Lost Relic
lines.flavourText: Time cannot wash away that which cannot be forgotten.

lines.name: Tranquillity
lines.flavourText: Beware the sudden calm, for it is a sure sign of a storm on the horizon.

lines.name: Turn the Other Cheek
lines.flavourText:
"Only after one forsakes rage, can true power be found."
- Sekhema Asenath

lines.name: Volatile Power
lines.flavourText: Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it.

lines.name: Mitts
lines.flavourText: Those whose hands are their livelihood know the importance of keeping them safe and warm.

lines.name: Call to the First Ones
lines.flavourText: The Ezomyte, desperate for aid, cried out to the gods.

lines.name: The Wretched
lines.flavourText: Necromancers, believe me, are more terrifying than their thralls.

lines.name: Lingering Remnants
lines.flavourText:
Never dying, yet not living,
Endlessly they wander
beneath the harvest moon.

lines.name: The Coming Storm
lines.flavourText: No man may hope to turn back the storm. You can only hope you do not attract its ire.

lines.name: The Wolverine
lines.flavourText: Claw them from the bottom, you'll be glad that you have got 'em, claw them from the top, you'll never want to stop.

lines.name: The Garish Power
lines.flavourText: Maligaro may have valued function over form, but that did not mute his flair for the dramatic.

lines.name: The Spark and the Flame
lines.flavourText: When sky meets ground the flames can be found, but who has the will to tame them.

lines.name: The Standoff
lines.flavourText: Sometimes your greatest enemy is the only one keeping you breathing.

lines.name: The Forsaken
lines.flavourText: You gave us life and love, more than you could spare. Now you're gone, and we are stranded, alone, cold and without purpose.

lines.name: Might is Right
lines.flavourText: The mind had much to endure before the advent of thaumaturgy.

lines.name: The Opulent
lines.flavourText: Wealth can, in fact, buy happiness.

lines.name: Struck by Lightning
lines.flavourText:
'Lightning never strikes the same place twice'
is really just wishful thinking.

lines.name: The Blazing Fire
lines.flavourText: Lethal, untouchable, keen, aflame. Just what I was looking for.

lines.name: The Ruthless Ceinture
lines.flavourText:
In combat, a warrior must first be resourceful,
and second, decisive.

lines.name: The Eye of the Dragon
lines.flavourText:
Some powers are far too great even for the
gods of old.

lines.name: The Realm
lines.flavourText: If you wish to rush into strange places, be prepared to face strange things.

lines.name: The Deceiver
lines.flavourText: Beware the combatant who shows no confidence, yet still enters the ring, for they are surely hiding something.

lines.name: The Puzzle
lines.flavourText: As countless fractures weaken the divide, nightmares seep through from the other side.

lines.name: The Insatiable
lines.flavourText: A lust for souls. The urge to kill just to satisfy its thirst. An unbearable burden that would make even the purest heart blacken over time.

lines.name: Forbidden Power
lines.flavourText: Some things should not be used. Some power is too great a risk.

lines.name: Three Voices
lines.flavourText: The village elders had a curious rule: If you hear three voices scream for aid, flee as fast as you can.

lines.name: The Army of Blood
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{I gave my mind without a fight, 
The twelfth hour I lost control. 
The day is gone but there is light, 
eyes that glow like red-hot coal.}

lines.name: The Beast
lines.flavourText: To know the monster, you must become the monster.

lines.name: The Sword King's Salute
lines.flavourText:
<size:26>{Many were slain by the sword king 
Their blood decorating his ring 
Those who retreated were slaughtered 
Those who fought bravely were honoured}

lines.name: The Fathomless Depths
lines.flavourText: Fall into endless night; a voyage into an ocean of oblivion.

lines.name: The Rite of Elements
lines.flavourText:
<size:29>{A mind as quick as lightning, 
fists as hard as stone, 
a heart that burns with fury, 
and eyes that chill to the bone.}

lines.name: The Dreamland
lines.flavourText: All dreams vanish when the dreamers wake.

lines.name: The Admirer
lines.flavourText: Lucian lost himself in ancient scrolls and found in those scrolls a love whose power bridged a millennium.

lines.name: The Witch
lines.flavourText:
<size:27>{A wanderer in the wild strives 
Against countless foes he survives 
A fool pursues a quest contrived 
By the gift of the witch, alive.}

lines.name: The Price of Protection
lines.flavourText:
To protect her mansion, she would cut a deal with anyone. Anything. 

Something answered.

lines.name: The Master Artisan
lines.flavourText: Perfection is the standard, excellence will be handled on a case by case basis.

lines.name: Dark Temptation
lines.flavourText:
"Only a fool looks to the occult for power and expects to be spared from its wrath." 
- Voll, Emperor of Purity

lines.name: The Journey
lines.flavourText: Oh the places you will go, the sights you will see, the things you will meet.

lines.name: The Golden Era
lines.flavourText: Before gemlings, before thaumaturgy, a simple court magician could enthrall the masses.

lines.name: Boon of Justice
lines.flavourText: Some gifts are obligations while others are simply opportunities.

lines.name: Thirst for Knowledge
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{A ravenous mind can readily take in ideas from any source. 
Fortunately for the scholars, he has already learned about sustainability.}

lines.name: Imperial Legacy
lines.flavourText: A life lost, A legacy born.

lines.name: The Deep Ones
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{"The Seas Call, the Mad Answer"}

lines.name: The Fool
lines.flavourText: Even the most learned man is a fool to his own fate.

lines.name: Buried Treasure
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{You can't seek riches without getting your hands dirty.}

lines.name: The Mountain
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{Charmed by beautiful stones 
Consumed with the 
pursuit of perfection 
Ever deeper into the waiting dark}

lines.name: The Skeleton
lines.flavourText: They stand among us, and within us.

lines.name: The Wolf's Legacy
lines.flavourText: The howls and cackling could not mask the sadness.

lines.name: The Side Quest
lines.flavourText: You'll never know the things you miss if you keep your eyes closed

lines.name: More is Never Enough
lines.flavourText: Greed is a hunger that only grows as you feed it

lines.name: Cameria's Cut
lines.flavourText:
"There are two ways to pay, Gold and Blood. I'll take my share in both."

-Cameria the Coldblooded

lines.name: The Bones
lines.flavourText: The flesh is a prison, and we are finally free.

lines.name: Baited Expectations
lines.flavourText: The line between having not enough to do and too much to do is unusually fine.

lines.name: The Tinkerer's Table
lines.flavourText: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

lines.name: The Easy Stroll
lines.flavourText:
"I'm going for a walk. I'll be back soon."

 - Blonca's last words

lines.name: The Journalist
lines.flavourText: A good spy doesn't forget she's gone undercover.

lines.name: The Cache
lines.flavourText:
<size:23>{Vintage or crafted, Glittering and shiny
Dusty or glittering, huge or tiny
Secured within a chest 
or unearthed from your mining
Find jewellery everywhere, 
no need for divining!
So why is it so hard 
to figure out which one to wear?
This one makes me stronger, 
but does it match my hair?}

lines.name: Cursed Words
lines.flavourText: If you look hard enough for hidden meaning, you will find it.

lines.name: Society's Remorse
lines.flavourText:
<size:28>{We live to dream of worlds we aren't in,
a false narrative that we use to fill our souls
with doubt;
The world is already beautiful,
there's no need to dream.}

lines.name: The Long Watch
lines.flavourText: <size:26>{The rain pelts down, Mud grasping at his feet, as thoughts of those in his care bolster his resolve.}

lines.name: Acclimatisation
lines.flavourText:
The world is ever-changing.
Once-lush woods now lost beneath shifting sands,
Great cities now drown beneath turbulent waters.
Adapt or perish.

lines.name: Prejudice
lines.flavourText: One who is blinded by their past may only see a sliver of the present.

lines.name: Brush, Paint and Palette
lines.flavourText: "Man may shape the world, but these? These shape the man." -Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: The Adventuring Spirit
lines.flavourText: Dost thou lead my men to victory, my child?

lines.name: The Last Supper
lines.flavourText: "Bino's brief career as a chef at Axiom saved the executioner a lot of work."

lines.name: A Sea of Blue
lines.flavourText: The harvest ended, the floods began.

lines.name: The Blessing of Moosh
lines.flavourText: While the Labyrinth traps have claimed countless adventurers, they were not designed with felines in mind.

lines.name: The Fox in the Brambles
lines.flavourText: <size:26>{Hemmingsworth 6:10 - "And the fox gazed out from the brambles, unreachable and smirking."}

lines.name: Disdain
lines.flavourText: <size:28>{No man sees all, but you'll see more than some see in a lifetime.}

lines.name: The Tireless Extractor
lines.flavourText:
<size:30>{"I am not alone in this. I have God by my side! And... you help sometimes, I suppose."
- Sister Cassia}

lines.name: Broken Truce
lines.flavourText: With a single act, years of peace have been shattered. An unknown assassin brings war upon us all.
